avatarDescription: Get an image of a user's avatar.

avatarDetailedDescription.extendedHelp: This command previews a user's avatar. If a user has a server-only avatar it will default to that, however if you want to see the main avatar just add `--u` or `--user` to the command.
explainedUsage: (Optional) The user's avatar to show, defaults to the message author.

reminderCreateSuccess: {{SUCCESS}} Created a task with the Id `[{{id}}]`.
reminderDeleteNone: {{ERROR}} I couldn't find any reminders to delete.'

reminderDetailedDescription.extendedHelp: This command allows you to create reminders and optionally repeat them at an interval. These reminders will by default send to your DMs and fallback to the channel you created them in if your DMs are closed.
explainedUsage: List all of your active reminders.
The duration of the reminder, these can be formats such as `3h` for three hours or `4d3h20m` for four days three hours and twenty minutes.
(Optional) If this is included I will repeat the reminder until it's deleted by you at the specified interval.
(Optional) The message to be sent with your reminder.
(Optional) The Json to embed in the reminder, this can be easily built using websites such as [embedbuilder](https://embedbuilder.yua.gg).
If editing a reminder, include new text to replace the current text.
The Id of the task you wish to view or cancel.

reminderDMWarn: **Please note that your DMs are closed right now, unless opened I will send the reminder in the channel you created it.**
reminderEditSuccess:
{{SUCCESS}} Edited the task from {{old, code}} to:
> {{new}}
reminderNone: {{ERROR}} You don't currently have any active reminders.
reminderShow:
On **{{date, fulldatetime}}** im going to remind you:
> *{{text}}*
